top_description_1: This is a website that provides useful information in the life sciences.
top_description_2: Anyone is free to browse and reuse it.
manual_of_database_and_tool: Video manual for databases and tools
about_description: TogoTV is a portal site for video manuals, lecture videos, illustrations and training materials for useful databases (DBs) and web tools in the life sciences. As life science research has grown in both scale and diversity, the usage of databases and web tools has become more complex and specialized. The usage of databases and web tools is indispensable for the efficient progress of research, and the skill to use them is one of the essential factors for a researcher to learn. TogoTV creates and organizes a variety of information to help researchers, technologists, and beginners who want to use them to reach and further their research resources.
feature_1_description: You can use the video manual, illustrations, and training materials at any time you want. (Please state the source.)
feature_2_title: From the beginners to the researchers
feature_2_description: Graduate students are the main intended user group. It is also designed to be easy to understand for researchers from different fields.
feature_3_description: It can be used for systematic teaching, like 'If you watch the videos in this order, you can get this skill'.
play_number_transition: Monthly video views and play time on TogoTV's YouTube channel (2007-2020)
author: Author
you_can_download_data_by_clicking_downlo: You can download it by clicking the Download button in the middle of the linked page.
request_description: This form is to freely request useful databases and web tools, whether you recommend them or not, that you think should be introduced (or content updated) on 'TogoTV' provided by the  DBCLS. In addition to the video manuals, you can also request useful images here. As a general rule, we do not share your information with anyone. If there is no information or content you want on TogoTV, you can provide your own feedback and contribution to our service.
develop_site_member_list: Dogrun Oishi Naoya, PENQE Akio Nagano, PENQE Reika Hirahara, Suetake Hirotaka
recruit_title: We are looking for someone to help us create videos and illustrations.
you_can_see_playlist: Click here to see the videos in the course.
specify_credits: Be sure to state the source and credit.
picture_liscense_text:
This illustration is available under a Creative Commons Attribution License. When you use it, please be sure to mention the source (©2016 DBCLS TogoTV / CC-BY-4.0) or the URL of the relevant page. You are free to use the material in any form, including figures and tables from papers, presentation slides, posters, press releases, promotional materials, etc., under the condition that only the source is mentioned. You may use any part of the source as long as it does not harm the appearance of the design. An image set for displaying the source of the material is also available for your use, so please feel free to use it as appropriate for your purposes. In papers and other publications (examples of citations), please include them in the acknowledgement and figure legends. (e.g., 'The image of XX is from TogoTV (©2016 DBCLS TogoTV / CC-BY-4.0).')
The activities of DBCLS, including TogoTV and TogoPictureGallery, have been assessed primarily in terms of how well they have been used, mainly in terms of the number of visits and citations, and are supported by the active support of users.
